tourName: Kenya safari and Zanzibar beach holiday
placesVisited: Safaris in Masai Mara, Stone Town, Zanzibar beaches, guided bush walks, hot air balloon flights and champagne breakfasts, luxury lodges
generalInfo:
This Kenya safari and Zanzibar beach holiday is a truly first-class experience: an activity-filled week in Kenya’s Masai Mara, followed by a relaxing week beside the stunning beaches and coral reefs of Zanzibar.

This holiday can be customised to suit your style and interests, so you’ll experience Kenya and Zanzibar in your own way. Our partner will recommend lodges and activities that not only deliver luxury but also positively impact the environment and support local communities.

Your first destination: the sweeping savannah of Kenya's Masai Mara. Here, safaris offer the chance to seek out the Big Five with expert guides, and you’ll stay at camps where you’ll learn about community-driven elephant and rhino conservation projects directly from those involved. Keen to watch herds of zebra from above as the sun sets over the plains? Trade the jeep for a hot-air balloon to take in a bird’s-eye view.

After a week of champagne breakfasts and night game drives, it’s time to swap your dusty boots for flip-flops as you head to Zanzibar. There’s no rush, with ample time set aside to delve into the history of this semi-autonomous island off the coast of Tanzania.

After exploring the alleys and markets of Stone Town, you’ll arrive at a beach hotel for the final days of your Kenya safari and Zanzibar beach escape – perhaps an eco-resort crafted entirely from local materials. Our partners will recommend snorkelling and scuba diving trips designed to respect the reefs – a vivid, colourful finish to your luxurious Kenya safari and Zanzibar beach adventure.

dayInfo.description: On this holiday, we offer a ‘meet and assist’ service. As soon as you disembark the plane you will be greeted by a friendly representative who will guide you all the way through the airport and escort you to your driver. You will then be transferred to the domestic airport in Nairobi where you’ll get onto a light aircraft and fly to the Masai Mara National Reserve. On arrival at the Masai Mara, a friendly representative will meet you and drive you to your accommodation where you will stay for the next four nights.

You will spend the next three days in the Masai Mara, you’ll enjoy incredible morning and afternoon game drives on the plains of Masai Mara. This iconic reserve offers incredible wildlife viewing experiences, some of the animals you may see are zebra, impala, gazelle, wildebeest, buffalo, rhino, elephant, lions, cheetahs and leopards. As another activity for for those interested in a slower pace and experiencing some of the smaller details of the bush, nature walks are also offered from the camp. Other than game drives, there are a range of other activities you can participate in during your time in the Masai Mara, such as cultural visits to Maasai villages and markets or an early morning hot air balloon flight over the plains and forests of the Masai Mara.

After enjoying an early morning game drive before being driven to the airstrip in time for your scheduled light aircraft flight to Nairobi, where you’ll get a connecting flight to the tropical island of Zanzibar. On arrival in Zanzibar you will be met and driven to the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Stone Town, where you will be staying for the next two nights. Your exquisite hotel is located in the ‘Old Town’ surrounded by many beautiful historic sites.

Today you’ll have a full day to explore Stone Town’s culture and discover the ancient stone houses, carved wooden doors, Arabian arches, latticed windows, and overhanging balconies. Some cultural places of interest that you may want to explore are the Portuguese Fort, the old Dhow Port, the Old Slave Market, the Sultan's Palace, the House of Wonders, Livingstone House, the Hamamni Baths and the Persian Baths of Kidichi.

After a delicous breakfast, you’ll check out of your accommodation and driven to your luxurious beach accommodation where you’ll spend the next six nights. Some of the islands best beaches are one the East coast making for a great area to explore during your stay. We'll work with a variety of accommodation options on Zanzibar and the surrounding islands and we can suggest the perfect option for your interests and requirements.

Enjoy Zanzibar at leisure. There are plenty of activities that you can join during your stay, including visits to Jozani Forest, Prison Island, the spice plantations and cultural tours to local villages. There’s also a wide choice of adventure activities that you can participate in, including mountain biking, hiking, bird watching, wind surfing, kite surfing, sea kayaking and sailing. The island has fantastic coral reefs which are perfect for diving and snorkelling—you may even be lucky enough to see dolphins and green turtles.

Enjoy your final morning on the beautiful island of Zanzibar. After a hearty breakfast, you’ll check out of your hotel and transfer to Abeid Amani Karume International Airport (ZNZ) for your flight home, taking with you unforgettable memories, incredible experiences, and stories that will last a lifetime.
